name: Production Variance Report
query:
select m.production_order as 'Order:Link/Production Order:120', m.standard_cost as 'Standard Materials Cost):Currency:150', m.actual_cost as 'Actual Materials Cost:Currency:150', p.time_in_mins as 'Standard Operation Time:Currency:160', p.actual_operation_time as 'Actual Operation Time:Currency:150',p.planned_operating_cost as 'Standard Operating Cost:Currency:160', p.actual_operating_cost as 'Actual Operating Cost:Currency:150'
from (
select production_order, sum(standard_qty*valuation_rate) as standard_cost, sum(actual_cost) as actual_cost from (
select * from (
select production_order, item_code, item_name, stock_uom, sum(standard_qty) as standard_qty, sum(actual_qty) as actual_qty, sum(valuation_rate) as valuation_rate, sum(actual_qty*valuation_rate) actual_cost 
from (
select s.production_order, st.item_code, st.item_name, st.stock_uom, st.qty*st.conversion_factor as actual_qty, st.valuation_rate, 0 as standard_qty
from `tabStock Entry Detail` st 
left join `tabStock Entry` s on s.name=st.parent 
left join `tabProduction Order` p on p.production_item=st.item_code
where s.docstatus=1 and purpose in ('Manufacture', 'Material Transfer for Manufacture')
and isnull(p.production_item)
union all
select p.parent, p.item_code, p.item_name, i.stock_uom, 0 as actual_qty, 0 , p.required_qty
from `tabProduction Order Item` p
left join `tabItem` i on p.item_code=i.name
where p.docstatus=1
union all
select po.name, sc.item_code, sc.item_name, sc.stock_uom, 0 as actual_qty, 0 , sc.stock_qty
from `tabBOM Scrap Item` sc
left join `tabProduction Order` po on po.bom_no=sc.parent
where sc.docstatus=1) a
group by production_order, item_code) b) h
group by production_order) m
left join (select parent, sum(time_in_mins) as time_in_mins, sum(actual_operation_time) as actual_operation_time, sum(planned_operating_cost) as planned_operating_cost, sum(actual_operating_cost) as actual_operating_cost from `tabProduction Order Operation` group by parent) p on p.parent=m.production_order
left join `tabProduction Order` po on p.parent=po.name
where po.status in ('Completed','Stopped') and po.company=%(company)s and po.business_unit=%(business_unit)s and po.actual_end_date>=%(from_date)s and po.actual_end_date<=%(to_date)s
order by production_order
